title: News24.com | Fourth positive coronavirus case at UCT
description: The Department of Health is in the process of contact tracing, and those identified as close contacts of the four have been asked to quarantine themselves for two weeks.
content:
The University of Cape Town (UCT) confirmed that yet another person at the university tested positive for Covid-19, bringing the tally up to four. 
This time, a postgraduate student has tested positive for the virus, according to a letter posted on www.news.… [+749 chars]
